snippet.title: Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble -  Axel Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Cabs are here! The rebellious Crazy Taxi driver, Axel, joins Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble as part of the SEGA Pass DLC! Get ready for a wild ride as Axel joins AiAi and friends, causing chaos along the way! Axel will be playable across both Adventure Mode and Battle Mode, with unique stats to help him on the courses. Plus, for Axel only, all in-game bananas will switch to coins in homage to the franchise so you can rack up some insane money.

The SEGA Pass is included with the Digital Deluxe Edition of Banana Rumble and will also be available as a separate bundle to purchase. Individual characters will also be available a la carte. All content is scheduled to be released over the coming months.

Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble launches exclusively for the Nintendo Switch family of systems June 25, 2024. 

Sign up for SEGA emails by July 2nd, 2024 to receive the special shinobi costume and pre-order today to receive the banana suit at https://www.bananarumble.com 🐵 

Stay tuned to our official social accounts.
X - https://twitter.com/sega 
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SEGA/ 
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/sega/ 
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@sega_west
